import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChatWithAIPage=()=>{const[messages,setMessages]=useState([{id:1,sender:'ai',text:'Hello! How can I help you today?'}]);const[inputValue,setInputValue]=useState('');const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const[sessionId,setSessionId]=useState(null);// Generate a unique session ID on component mount
useEffect(()=>{// Check if we already have a session ID in localStorage
const storedSessionId=localStorage.getItem('chat_session_id');if(storedSessionId){setSessionId(storedSessionId);}else{// Generate a new session ID
const newSessionId="session_".concat(Date.now(),"_").concat(Math.random().toString(36).substr(2,9));localStorage.setItem('chat_session_id',newSessionId);setSessionId(newSessionId);}},[]);const handleSendMessage=async()=>{if(inputValue.trim()===''||isLoading||!sessionId)return;// Add user message
const newUserMessage={id:Date.now(),sender:'user',text:inputValue};setMessages(prev=>[...prev,newUserMessage]);setInputValue('');setIsLoading(true);try{// Call the Rust backend endpoint which proxies to FastAPI

Please try again.'};setMessages(prev=>[...prev,errorMessage]);}finally{setIsLoading(false);}};const handleKeyPress=e=>{if(e.key==='Enter'&&!isLoading){handleSendMessage();}};// Clear chat history function
